GSD.product_version: versions from v4.19 to before v5.15.75
GSD.description:
drm/msm/dpu: index dpu_kms->hw_vbif using vbif_idx

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit 635e7700c5b4ca2baa4ffaa25c8a1e086ede1176, it was introduced in version v4.19 by commit 25fdd5933e4c0f5fe2ea5cd59994f8ac5fbe90ef. For more details please see the references link.
